++++++++++++++  ++  ++++++++++++++
++++++++++++++    ++++++++++++++++       ➤ Package Notes
++++++++++++++  ++  ++++++++++++++
++++++++++++  ++++    ++++++++++++          ☞ Build the project before opening the model editor.
++++++++++  ++++++++  ++++++++++++          ☞ The package only adds the required references. To install Xpand.ExpressApp.SystemModule.XpandSystemModule add the next line in the constructor of your XAF module.
++++++++++  ++++++++++  ++++++++++              RequiredModuleTypes.Add(typeof(Xpand.ExpressApp.SystemModule.XpandSystemModule));
++++++++  ++++++++++++++++++++++++
++++++  ++++++++++++++++++++++++++
